SEARCH
Package com.ubicua.didas.resources

Class DidasJpaRoleProviderFactory

java.lang.Object
org.keycloak.models.jpa.JpaRoleProviderFactory
com.ubicua.didas.resources.DidasJpaRoleProviderFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.keycloak.models.RoleProviderFactory, org.keycloak.provider.ProviderFactory
public class DidasJpaRoleProviderFactory extends org.keycloak.models.jpa.JpaRoleProviderFactory
Factory that produces JPA-based realm providers enhanced for DID discovery roles.

Extends Keycloak's JpaRoleProviderFactory to:

  • Provide a custom provider ID "didas-jpa".
  • Create instances of DidasJpaRealmProvider using the EntityManager for persisting DID discovery attributes alongside standard role data.

Lifecycle Hooks

  • init(Config.Scope) – called once at subsystem startup to initialize JPA configuration, delegates to superclass.
  • postInit(KeycloakSessionFactory) – no custom logic after session factory initialization, inherits default behavior.
  • close() – invoked at shutdown to release resources, delegates to superclass.
Author:
Ivan Kuchumov

    • create

      public DidasJpaRealmProvider create(org.keycloak.models.KeycloakSession session)
      Creates a new DidasJpaRealmProvider for the current session.

      Obtains an EntityManager from the JPA connection provider and constructs a realm-specific provider capable of inserting DID discovery attributes.

      Specified by:
